amendment.description: Amendment requires lenders of student loans to inform borrowers of income-sensitive repayment options at the time the loan is offered.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 16 in the Congressional Record of April 28, 1998 to require lenders of student loans to inform borrowers of income-sensitive repayment options at the time the loan is offered.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
